p: In terms of spatial patterns, both the observations and the model ALL ensembles show large-scale stratospheric cooling and tropospheric warming signals ( Fig. 2). Even the CanESM2 and CESM1 ALL realizations with the smallest trends in global-mean temperature exhibit large-scale decreases in TLS and increases in TMT and TLT.
